message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a framework for continual learning using Variational Auto Encoders (VAE) and boosting-like approximation. This involves machine learning (cs.LG) techniques for image generation (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) tasks. The paper also discusses the use of neural networks (cs.NE) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) in the proposed approach.
